name: Markos Vamvakaris
description: '''Markos Vamvakaris''' ({{langx|el|Μάρκος Βαμβακάρης}}; 10 May 1905 – 8 February 1972), was a [[Greece|Greek]] musician of ''[[rebetiko]]'', universally referred to by ''rebetiko'' writers and fans simply by his first name, Markos. The great significance of Vamvakaris for the rebetiko is also reflected by his nickname: the "[[patriarch]] of the rebetiko".
